attributes.action: We the Electorate demand a snap General Election before 29/03/2019
attributes.additional_details: Evidence has been shown by May's back peddling, Corbyn's reversal of policy and the House of Commons retreating from a No Deal policy that is the Peoples wish.
attributes.background: The Electorate has been betrayed by their MP's over Brexit. With a snap General Election all MPs that that went against their constituents wishes should be deselected and new ones put in their place.
